text: The Captain's Daughter () is a 1958 Soviet drama film directed by Vladimir Kaplunovskiy.Программа XXV Российского кинофестиваля «Литература и кино»: с 4 по 10 апреляЛучшие фильмы, которые нужно бы показать российским детям (список)10 вариантов провести выходные в Москве 14-15 октябряВячеслав Шалевич ушёл из жизни в Москве == Plot == The film tells about the nobleman Grinyov, going to military service in the fortress, where he falls in love with the commander's daughter, Maria, and fights for her in a duel. After that, Pugachev organizes an uprising, conquers the fortress and executes Maria's parents, but he gives Grinev the freedom. Soon he learns that Pugachev's accomplice forces Maria to marry him...Капитанская дочка == Cast == * Oleg Strizhenov as Pyotr Grinyov * Sergei Lukyanov as Yemelyan Pugachyov * Iya Arepina as Masha Mironova * Vladimir Dorofeyev as Ivan Kuzmich * Irina Zarubina as Vasilisa Yegorovna * Anatoli Shishkov as Savelyich * Vyacheslav Shalevich as Shvabrin * Pavel Pavlenko as Ivan Ignatyevich * Boris Novikov as MaksimychКапитанская дочка (1958) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * * Капитанская дочка on Kinopoisk Category:1958 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films Category:1958 drama films
